channel.title: Hello, Victor from ewolo.fitness here
channel.description:
Hi all,
I've recently created a side-project ewolo.fitness that allows you to log your workouts.
Something really cool about this project is that the frond-end is written in React / Redux and is completely open source!
I'll be blogging soon about my experience in bootstrapping this - any tips on content marketing would be much appreciated :)

item.title: Hello, Victor from ewolo.fitness here
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
wheresvic:

Something really cool about this project is that the frond-end is written in React / Redux and is completely open source!

That’s cool for you. This is not cool for users. They don’t care.

Read full topic
